list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The Lancaster bombers flew missions at night.

list_ex_of_english: Our general line will, therefore, be to improve these two bombers by stretching out their performance in the next few years.
If there is a case, if we are to have dive bombers, how are we to get them?
If so, it is important that it should be made quite clear, because of the discouraging effect on men engaged in manufacturing dive-bombers.
The other is the existing bombers, whatever nuclear rôle they have, and, as we have said, these also should and must be internationalised.
We are giving up much in order that we may have these jet medium bombers.
Then there is the advent of jet bombers and fighters.
As the speed of bombers constantly increases, however, so it becomes increasingly vital to get greater range for the early warning system.
Was it a speech calculated to encourage the personnel of the bombers who fight these great battles?
